revised_title: Investigating the Relationship between Opsonins and Red Blood-Cells
tldr: The authors explore the relationship between opsonins and red blood-cells, discovering that opsonins can be removed from serum using washed red blood-cells and that dilution of serum does not affect the process of sensibilisation. They also find that a 1:1 ratio of serum to red blood-cells is necessary for complete sensibilisation and optimal phagocytosis.
